actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill entitled "A bill for the relief of Aetna Insurance Company, and other insurance companies" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 439, a bill for the relief of named insurance companies, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill entitled "A bill for the relief of Aetna Insurance Company, and other insurance companies" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.
